喛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuán］
［《集韻》于元切，平元，云。］
哀叹。

喛字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　喛； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页199第02
【廣韻】火貫切【集韻】呼玩切，?音煥。【玉篇】喛呼。　又【揚子·方言】喛，恚也，秦晉曰喛，不欲譍而强答之意也。　又【揚子·方言】喛，哀也。【註】喛，哀而恚也，音段。◎按喛無段音，疑誤。　又【廣韻】況袁切【集韻】許元切，?音暄。【廣韻】恐懼。【集韻】愁也。　又【集韻】恚也。　又【集韻】于元切，音袁。哀也。　又虎猥切，音賄。義同。　又胡戈切，音和。嘽喛，泣貌。　又火遠切，諼上聲。本作咺。詳前咺字註。

喛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
喛字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　喛; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 199 02
[Guangyun] Huoguanqi [Jiyun] Huwanqi,? Yinhuan. [Jade articles] 喛call.　[Yangtze Dialect] 喛, Yun Ye, Qin Jin said 喛, not wanting to 譍, but the meaning of strong answer.　[Yangtze Dialect] again, sorrow. [Note] Huh, mournful and sad, segment. ◎Press 喛 no segment, doubtful mistakes.　[Guang Yun] Kuang Yuan Qi [Ji Yun] Xu Yuan Qi,? Yin Xuan. [Guang Yun] Fear. 【Ji Yun】Sorrow too.　 [Ji Yun] Yun Ye.　[Jiyun] Yu Yuanqie, sound Yuan. Sorrow too.　Cut again, sound bribed. The same meaning.　Hu Geqie again, Yinhe.啴喛, weeping appearance.　The fire cuts far away, and the sound is heard. This is for 咺. Please refer to the previous note.
